page.title: 05THE BISCUIT STORE.
page.content: This is the main industry in Thorpe_on_the_Hill.It has only been there for three years yet it is the largest business there.The store has biscuits,drinks and toys delivered and then the store distributes the stock to various shops in Lincoln and the surrounding area.The store does a daily delivery but this does not make the traffic too heavy. The biscuits are delivered to the store by Foxes,a well known biscuit manufacturer.The Biscuit Store is not involved in the production of the goods,only the delivering.This business provides various jobs for the people in the community.
